title: Ep. 1043 - Hostages Of The Radical Left
description:
A celebrity lasts four days questioning the trans agenda before issuing a groveling apology, Joe Biden spreads fake news about a 10-year-old trying to get an abortion, and Hunter Biden’s leaked cell phone files make his laptop look wholesome.

Become a DailyWire+ member today to access the extensive content catalog: https://utm.io/ueIZt
